cause.description:
This cause is for people who love animals and want to help save them. I do not know how the donations on facebook work ... but here is the donation page for Bandit for the walk for the animals
https://www.kintera.org/faf/donorReg/donorPledge.asp?ievent=237686&lis=1&kntae237686=F4E84968324B4448AA63BF8D816AAA21&supId=139908476
the walk is September 30th, and all money on that website goes straight to the Nebraska Humane Society ... please donate and froward this on to anyone who may be able to help save the animals
As always the animals are forever greatful for your support
1. All animals deserve a good home
cause.mission: help raise money for the animals that are helped by the humane society
cause.name: Walk for the Animals
